name: Web Ascender
description:
Web Ascender is a unique web design, web development and internet marketing firm located in Okemos, Michigan. We specialize in creating beautiful, highly functional websites, mobile applications and online systems that leverage the power of the web, and we truly care about your happiness and the success of your project. Our team is comprised of brilliant designers, creative online marketers and amazing developers who love the work they do.
If you have a project that has to be done right the first time, get in touch with our team. Web Ascender is a Michigan- based web development company dedicated to helping our clients and partners grow their online presence and their business.
